insert into rc_recharge_station (MOBILE, STATION_NAME, STATION_LOCATION, CREATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, MEMBER_ID, CITY_ID) values (#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stationLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update rc_recharge_station
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATION_NAME = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATION_LOCATION = #{stationLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where RECHARGE_STATION_ID = #{rechargeStationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select RECHARGE_STATION_ID, MOBILE, STATION_NAME, STATION_LOCATION, CREATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, MEMBER_ID, CITY_ID from rc_recharge_station where RECHARGE_STATION_ID = #{rechargeStationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
